channel.title: github actions on thedevopscat blog site
channel.description: Recent content in github actions on thedevopscat blog site

item.title: Azure Static Web Apps vs Github Pages
item.description: In this post I compare hosting a static website on Github Pages vs Azure Static Websites, and give my thoughts, who will win!? Guess you’ll have to read it…

item.title: Static Website Hosting on Github - Part 3
item.description: This post covers hosting a static website on github pages with fully automated jamstack workflow and all builds done by github actions.

item.title: Static Website Hosting on Github - Part 2
item.description: This post explores hosting a static website on github pages and what would be required to move to github pages from azure static web app hosting.

item.title: Static Website Hosting on Github - Part 1
item.description: This post covers the basics of hosting a static website on github pages and what would be required to move to github pages from azure static web app hosting.

item.title: Automating Algolia Search with Azure Static Web App
item.description: Having just completed the setup of algolia search on this site I felt compelled to write a new post and let you know my experience, as it may save you some time! Suffice to say, the potentially difficult part was easy, and the easy part was hard! This may be down to the combination of my (feature rich) Bilberry theme and Hugo, so if you choose this combination, This may be of particular interest.
